name: AllOutDelivery
description:
This game has 2 downloads, 1 for each mode:

Easy, Deliver 1 package to an house, its a large grid and there are multiple houses, 1 of them is the real.

Impossible, Controls are randomized, you can go forward/backward without you wanting. brakes can malfunction, at the start you are greeted with 2 flocks of cars ramming into you slowing you down, the controls switch every 5 seconds, and you have a chance of being teleported to the start every 30 seconds, good luck, use the "R" key to restart the level (works in easy too). Can you make it in 1 minute?

Note: If you need to exit force closing by:
alt + f4 (WINDOWS)

Command + Option + Esc (MAC)

Alt + f4 (LINUX, i dont have linux. i dont know the shortcuts but i think it is the same, correct me in the comments pls)

Credits:

BlueBanana - Programmer

IkeVoodoo - Programmer

Jackevmi - 3D Modeler

AnothonyN617 - 3D Modeler / artist

DiamondOnyx - Ideas, Music, SFX, Project Management
